name: Urban Runner
content:
game:
  game_id: gob
  path: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- write_file:
    content: '#!/bin/bash

      src=$1

      dst=$2

      src_path=$(echo "$1" | sed -r "s/(.+)\/.+/\1/")

      find "$src_path" -type f \( -name "*.stk" -o -name "*.itk" \) -exec cp {} "$dst"
      \;'
    file: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- chmodx: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert disc 1
    requires: cd1.itk
- execute:
    args: $DISC $GAMEDIR
    file: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- execute:
    args: -R 775  "$GAMEDIR"
    file: /bin/chmod
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert disc 2
    requires: cd2.itk
- execute:
    args: $DISC $GAMEDIR
    file: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- execute:
    args: -R 775  "$GAMEDIR"
    file: /bin/chmod
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert disc 3
    requires: cd3.itk
- execute:
    args: $DISC $GAMEDIR
    file: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- execute:
    args: -R 775  "$GAMEDIR"
    file: /bin/chmod
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert disc 4
    requires: cd4.itk
- execute:
    args: $DISC $GAMEDIR
    file: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- execute:
    args: -R 775  "$GAMEDIR"
    file: /bin/chmod
